name: Maintenance / Upgrade
about: Create a task for version upgrades, refactoring, or technical debt
title: "[Maintenance] "
labels: maintenance, chore
assignees: ""
---

**Describe the maintenance task**
A clear and concise description of the maintenance required (e.g., Upgrading from .NET 8 to .NET 10, updating dependencies, refactoring a specific class).

**Motivation and Context**
Why is this maintenance needed? What benefits will it bring? (e.g., Performance improvements, security patches, aligning with new framework standards).

**Proposed Changes**

- [ ] List the high-level steps or changes required.
- [ ]

**Impact on Existing Code**
Will this introduce breaking changes? Does it require updates to other parts of the system?

**Additional context**
Add any other context or links to relevant documentation here.
